name: SS MISSION: SAVE SNOWFLAKE
description: This penguin may look cute and all but don't underestimate him. This cute penguin is known as Agent P. Agent P is a FBI veteran that has worked undercover for the government for his entire life ever since he was learning how to waddle. He followed in his dad's flippersteps and wanted to become a legend just like him. During Agent P's  time, he has solved many cases and has taken down big secret industries that have threatened his country. He was the best in the industry and was praised by the government. He is now retired and has a family of his own living peacefully in their igloo until one day when he was picking his daughter up from school named Snowflake, she wasn't at her usual spot and all he sees is her backpack on the side of the road. He walks towards the backpack and notices a note for him saying that they have kidnapped her out of revenge and has challenged Agent P to try to take her back. He sees the logo on the note and knows exactly who he was dealing with. Without hesitation, Agent P rushes to the enemies secret lair in order to save his Snowflake.
